name: The Floor Is Lava (itch) (StagGames)
description:
A Platformer With No Up Or Down

Use the mouse to guide your character across a shifting sea of rocks.

Please vote and remember to click save rating afterwards.

This is one of two games I made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2018 game jam, the other was https://staggames.itch.io/zombie-survival-shooter-but-with-no-shooting-of-zombie...
